question:
You work for an international company and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.Write a letter to your manager.In your letter:

explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six monthssay how your work could be done while you are awayask for his/her help in arranging itWrite at least 150 words.
text: The reason to pen down this letter is that I am interested in working in the head office which is located in Bergen, Norway.

Firstly, I would like to tell you that I had selected for training last week with the people at our head office and they have served a lot of things in that particular training with the help of great devices which are not available at our workplace, and that can make our work more productive quite easily. However, I am not trained to conduct such gadgets but I think I  will learn if I would get training in the head office.
Therefore, I have decided to carry my official laptop along with me so that I can do my work sitting miles away.
Lastly, in this matter, I will be requiring your assistance. It would be great if you could drop an email on this to the upper management so that they will make up their mind and decide accordingly.
I hope to hear a positive response from your end.
